verses.roman:
sārvabhauma kahe,--śīghra karaha madhyāhna
muñi bhikṣā dimu āji mahā-prasādānna

synonyms: sārvabhauma—Sārvabhauma Bhaṭṭācārya; kahe—says; śīghra—very soon; karaha—do; madhya-ahna—midday duties; muñi—I; bhikṣā—alms; dimu—shall offer; āji—today; mahā-prasāda-anna—remnants of food offered to Lord Jagannātha.
translation: The Bhaṭṭācārya informed all of them, "Please take your midday baths immediately. Today I shall offer you mahā-prasāda, the remnants of food offered to Lord Jagannātha."
